title: Parents of Nigeria's missing Dapchi schoolgirls plead for their return
text:
Parents of Nigeria's missing Dapchi schoolgirls plead for their return Saturday, March 10, 2018 - 01:12 
The parents of a 12-year-old girl who was abducted by Boko Haram in Dapachi say they doubt promises by the government. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
The parents of a 12-year-old girl who was abducted by Boko Haram in Dapachi say they doubt promises by the government. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2p6gQ2H
